message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great deal for both of us, as you know the value of this product is quite high. Let's make this happen!

Alice, I appreciate the offer but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. This is still a good deal for you and allows me to stay within my budget. Let's see if we can make this work.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000, which still provides a great deal for you.  Let's close this deal!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000. This price is fair for both of us, and allows us to close this deal. Let's reach an agreement.
Bob, we're getting closer!  I'm willing to come down to $1,275,000. This is a fair price for both of us and will allow us to close this deal quickly. Let's make it happen!
